basics.name: Philipp Nazari
basics.label: MsC Mathematics at ETH
basics.summary: I am a MsC student in Mathematics at ETH Zurich. I will soon start my PhD in Computer Science with Konstantin Rusch and Fanny Yang.

work.name: Scientific AI Lab
work.summary: Student Researcher at the Scientific AI lab. Working on the Paper 'Geometric Autoencoders: What You See is What You Decode'.

publications.name: Geometric Autoencoders - What You See is What You Decode
publications.summary: Creating geometrically meaningful representations by learning a volume preserving decoder.
